pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Weibull Probability Plots with 'WeibullR' // Build interactive Weibull Probability Plots with 'WeibullR' by David Silkworth and Jurgen Symynck (2022) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=WeibullR, an R package for Weibull analysis, and 'plotly' by Carson Sievert (2020) https://plotly-r.com, an interactive web-based graphing library.
